H0.text: Which prophet secretly anointed David as King of Israel. Nathan

H1.text: Which prophet secretly anointed David as King of Israel. Gad

H2.text: Which prophet secretly anointed David as King of Israel. Ahijah

H3.text: Which prophet secretly anointed David as King of Israel. Samuel

A4.text: Samuel then proceeded to Bethlehem and secretly anointed David as king.
